item.title: Learning a language? Speak it like you’re playing a video game
item.description: Learning a language? Speak it like you’re playing a video game | Marianna Pascal So for the past 20 years, I’ve been helping Malaysian and other Southeast Asians to speak better English. And through training thousands of Southeast Asians, I’ve discovered a very surprising truth. I’ve discovered that how well somebody communicates in English actually has very little to do with their English level. It has a lot to do with their attitude towards English.
